title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Storytelling-based Early Literacy Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational literacy education theory and elementary education experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Gagné’s nine events of instruction can be applied to early childhood literacy education

Learners compare traditional storytelling (narrative structure, character development) with digital storytelling (interactive media, multimedia elements), select suitable methods for ≥2 of 3 given educational scenarios, and explain implementation plans within 500 characters.
Design literacy activity materials for young children using smartphone-based tools
Develop and utilize formative assessment tools to measure learner growth

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
